message_region_too_small: The region is too small (must be >80px).
message_tag_not_set_small_small: Tag was not set, the region is too small.
message_create_region_before_submit: Create at least one region with a tag before submitting.
message_tag_each_region: You should add a tag to each region.
message_tag_the_region: You should add a tag to the region.
message_tag_not_predefined: This tag is not in the predefined list.
message_tag_empty: You need to enter a tag here
message_image_next_ignore_tooltip: Ignore this image and associated tags and go to the next image.
message_leave_tooltip: Leave this page, cancel all tags of this image. Validated tags will be kept.
message_unable_send_check_con: Unable to send data, please retry or check your connection.
message_select_picture_region: > Select a region from the picture.
message_add_highlighted_region_tag: Add highlighted region with associated tag.
message_validate_get_next_image_tooltip: Validate all the tags added to this image and go to the next image.
